alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 3:20AM CST until March 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions with reduced visibility. Most of the expected snow will fall Wednesday night into Thursday morning, which could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The wind will generally be northeasterly at around 15 mph with gusts of 20 to 25 mph. Therefore, some blowing and drifting snow will also be possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecast for updates on this situation. The storm track is still a bit uncertain and could shift a bit either north or south.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
